title: Antibody Reagents   schema
description: Proteins (natural or engineered) which ordinarily elicit an immune response in vivo; utilized in in vitro or in vivo studies for protein recognition and marking or as system perturbagens.

AR_Name.title: AR_Name
AR_Name.description: Antibody name according to the vendor or provider
AR_Name.schema:name: AR_Name
AR_Name.schema:description: Antibody name according to the vendor or provider

items.title: AR_Alternative_Name
items.description: Other names for the antibody
items.schema:name: AR_Alternative_Name
items.schema:description: Other names for the antibody

items.title: AR_Alternative_ID
items.description: This field should be populated with alternative IDs other than RRIDs. A separate field exists for RRID.
items.schema:name: AR_Alternative_ID
items.schema:description: This field should be populated with alternative IDs other than RRIDs. A separate field exists for RRID.

items.title: AR_Center_Canonical_ID
items.description: LINCS DSGC-specific canonical ID. This will be assigned by a given LINCS DSGC according to its reagent registration scheme.
items.schema:name: AR_Center_Canonical_ID
items.schema:description: LINCS DSGC-specific canonical ID. This will be assigned by a given LINCS DSGC according to its reagent registration scheme.

items.title: AR_Relevant_Citations
items.description: Relevant citations for antibody generation or labeling as PMIDs or patent numbers.
items.schema:name: AR_Relevant_Citations
items.schema:description: Relevant citations for antibody generation or labeling as PMIDs or patent numbers.

items.title: AR_Center_Name
items.description: The name of the center using the antibody
items.schema:name: AR_Center_Name
items.schema:description: The name of the center using the antibody

items.title: AR_Center_Batch_ID
items.description: LINCS DSGC-specific antibody batch ID. This will be assigned by a given LINCS center according to its antibody registration scheme.
items.schema:name: AR_Center_Batch_ID
items.schema:description: LINCS DSGC-specific antibody batch ID. This will be assigned by a given LINCS center according to its antibody registration scheme.

items.title: AR_Provider_Name
items.description: Vendor or lab that supplied the antibody
items.schema:name: AR_Provider_Name
items.schema:description: Vendor or lab that supplied the antibody

items.title: AR_Provider_Catalog_ID
items.description: ID or catalog number(s) assigned to the antibody by the vendor or provider
items.schema:name: AR_Provider_Catalog_ID
items.schema:description: ID or catalog number(s) assigned to the antibody by the vendor or provider

items.title: AR_Provider_Batch_ID
items.description: Batch or lot number assigned to the antibody by the vendor or provider
items.schema:name: AR_Provider_Batch_ID
items.schema:description: Batch or lot number assigned to the antibody by the vendor or provider

AR_RRID.title: AR_RRID
AR_RRID.description: Resource Identification Initiative ID (RRID) from Antibody Registry (http://antibodyregistry.org/search). If an RRID is not available yet, the user should request registration for their antibody with this registry
AR_RRID.schema:name: AR_RRID
AR_RRID.schema:description: Resource Identification Initiative ID (RRID) from Antibody Registry (http://antibodyregistry.org/search). If an RRID is not available yet, the user should request registration for their antibody with this registry

items.title: AR_Antibody_Type
items.description: Specification of whether the antibody is natural (immunologically selected in an animal) or engineered.
items.schema:name: AR_Antibody_Type
items.schema:description: Specification of whether the antibody is natural (immunologically selected in an animal) or engineered.

items.title: AR_Target_Protein
items.description: Nominal protein target, based on the recommended name from UniProt. If the name of a related entity (e.g. a portion of the polypeptide) was used instead to generate the antibody, this should be documented explicitly in AR_Immunogen
items.schema:name: AR_Target_Protein
items.schema:description: Nominal protein target, based on the recommended name from UniProt. If the name of a related entity (e.g. a portion of the polypeptide) was used instead to generate the antibody, this should be documented explicitly in AR_Immunogen

items.title: AR_Target_Protein_ID
items.description: UniProt ID of the protein target of the antibody. If the name of a related entity (e.g. a portion of the polypeptide) was used instead to generate the antibody, this should be documented explicitly in AR_Immunogen
items.schema:name: AR_Target_Protein_ID
items.schema:description: UniProt ID of the protein target of the antibody. If the name of a related entity (e.g. a portion of the polypeptide) was used instead to generate the antibody, this should be documented explicitly in AR_Immunogen

items.title: AR_Target_Protein_LINCS_ID
items.description: Global LINCS protein ID of the protein target of the antibody
items.schema:name: AR_Target_Protein_LINCS_ID
items.schema:description: Global LINCS protein ID of the protein target of the antibody

items.title: AR_Target_Protein_Center_ID
items.description: LINCS DSGC-specific protein ID of protein target of antibody. This will be assigned by a given LINCS center according to its protein registration scheme
items.schema:name: AR_Target_Protein_Center_ID
items.schema:description: LINCS DSGC-specific protein ID of protein target of antibody. This will be assigned by a given LINCS center according to its protein registration scheme

items.title: AR_Non-Protein_Target
items.description: Name of the nominal target of antibody if not a protein
items.schema:name: AR_Non-Protein_Target
items.schema:description: Name of the nominal target of antibody if not a protein

items.title: AR_Target_Organism
items.description: Organism of the antibody target. Use standardized NCBI Taxon nomenclature (e.g. Homo sapiens)
items.schema:name: AR_Target_Organism
items.schema:description: Organism of the antibody target. Use standardized NCBI Taxon nomenclature (e.g. Homo sapiens)

AR_Immunogen.title: AR_Immunogen
AR_Immunogen.description: Complete description of the immunogen (if produced in an animal) or entity used to select the epitope (if selected in vitro), including the source of the immunogen/entity (e.g. recombinantly expressed in E. coli, purified from canine pancreas) and its method of preparation. Any references relevant to the immunogen/target or production of the antibody should be listed in AR_Relevant_Reference
AR_Immunogen.schema:name: AR_Immunogen
AR_Immunogen.schema:description: Complete description of the immunogen (if produced in an animal) or entity used to select the epitope (if selected in vitro), including the source of the immunogen/entity (e.g. recombinantly expressed in E. coli, purified from canine pancreas) and its method of preparation. Any references relevant to the immunogen/target or production of the antibody should be listed in AR_Relevant_Reference

AR_Immunogen_Sequence.title: AR_Immunogen_Sequence
AR_Immunogen_Sequence.description: Complete amino acid sequence of the immunogen or entity used to select the epitope if it was a peptide, protein fragment, or small protein
AR_Immunogen_Sequence.schema:name: AR_Immunogen_Sequence
AR_Immunogen_Sequence.schema:description: Complete amino acid sequence of the immunogen or entity used to select the epitope if it was a peptide, protein fragment, or small protein

AR_Antibody_Species.title: AR_Antibody_Species
AR_Antibody_Species.description: Organism from which the antibody was derived if produced in an animal or the species from which the Fc domain of the antibody was derived if engineered
AR_Antibody_Species.schema:name: AR_Antibody_Species
AR_Antibody_Species.schema:description: Organism from which the antibody was derived if produced in an animal or the species from which the Fc domain of the antibody was derived if engineered

items.title: AR_Antibody_Clonality
items.description: Identification of the antibody as monoclonal or polyclonal
items.schema:name: AR_Antibody_Clonality
items.schema:description: Identification of the antibody as monoclonal or polyclonal

items.title: AR_Antibody_Isotype
items.description: Isotype (e.g. IgG, IgM, etc.) of the Fc domain of the antibody or antibody mixture if polyclonal
items.schema:name: AR_Antibody_Isotype
items.schema:description: Isotype (e.g. IgG, IgM, etc.) of the Fc domain of the antibody or antibody mixture if polyclonal

AR_Antibody_Production_Source_Organism.title: AR_Antibody_Production_Source_Organism
AR_Antibody_Production_Source_Organism.description: Organism or cell type used to produce the antibody
AR_Antibody_Production_Source_Organism.schema:name: AR_Antibody_Production_Source_Organism
AR_Antibody_Production_Source_Organism.schema:description: Organism or cell type used to produce the antibody

items.title: AR_Antibody_Production_Details
items.description: If the antibody was produced originally in an animal, including if it is currently derived from hybridoma cells, this field includes relevant information about the antibody production method that is not captured in other fields. If the antibody was engineered, this field includes information about the methods used to engineer and produce the antibody (e.g. humanized mouse antibody sequence expressed in and protein A-purified from yeast cells) and any other relevant details not captured in other fields. Any references relevant to antibody production should be listed in AR_Relevant_References
items.schema:name: AR_Antibody_Production_Details
items.schema:description: If the antibody was produced originally in an animal, including if it is currently derived from hybridoma cells, this field includes relevant information about the antibody production method that is not captured in other fields. If the antibody was engineered, this field includes information about the methods used to engineer and produce the antibody (e.g. humanized mouse antibody sequence expressed in and protein A-purified from yeast cells) and any other relevant details not captured in other fields. Any references relevant to antibody production should be listed in AR_Relevant_References

AR_Antibody_Labeling.title: AR_Antibody_Labeling
AR_Antibody_Labeling.description: If the antibody was labeled or conjugated, what fluor or enzyme (e.g. horseradish peroxidase) is conjugated to the antibody
AR_Antibody_Labeling.schema:name: AR_Antibody_Labeling
AR_Antibody_Labeling.schema:description: If the antibody was labeled or conjugated, what fluor or enzyme (e.g. horseradish peroxidase) is conjugated to the antibody

items.title: AR_Antibody_Labeling_Details
items.description: If the antibody was labeled or conjugated, this field includes information about the protocol used to conjugate the fluor or enzyme to the antibody. Any references relevant to antibody labeling should be listed in AR_Relevant_References
items.schema:name: AR_Antibody_Labeling_Details
items.schema:description: If the antibody was labeled or conjugated, this field includes information about the protocol used to conjugate the fluor or enzyme to the antibody. Any references relevant to antibody labeling should be listed in AR_Relevant_References

items.title: AR_Antibody_Purity
items.description: Purity of the antibody
items.schema:name: AR_Antibody_Purity
items.schema:description: Purity of the antibody

items.title: AR_Comments
items.description: DSGC Comments regarding reagent
items.schema:name: AR_Comments
items.schema:description: DSGC Comments regarding reagent

schema:name: Antibody Reagents
